info.name: Steamgifts Modern
info.description: Night skin for SteamGifts Requires Stylus, grab it here > Firefox - Chrome - Opera *****Click on CUSTOMIZE SETTINGS before installing*****
info.additionalInfo: --History-- 1.2 - colored giveaway feedback on profiles (received/not). 1.1 - added style for esgst user tags autofill; added "reveal hidden links" option; added "mark visited links" option. 1.0 - released. ============================================================ --Options-- Add ESGST Compatibility (default OFF) Modifies the base style for ESGST compatibility. Reveal Spoiler Text (default ON) Makes spoiler text readable without the need of hovering the mouse cursor (it doesn't completely reveal spoilers so you know when there's something hidden). Hide Patreon Cosmetics (default ON) Removes cosmetic extras from profiles and names. Insert Background Image (default ON) Adds a low opacity image to the background. Background URL Pick a default image, or upload your favorite. Recommended settings: - your screen resolution (ie: 1920x1080) - JPG quality: low (the image is blurred so it doesn't matter) Background Blur (default MEDIUM) Applies a blur effect to the background to make elements more prominent. Reveal Hidden Links (default ON) Makes hidden links visible without the need to check the source code. Limited detection in Chrome, full in Firefox. Mark Visited Links (default ON) Changes the color of visited links in comments (discussions, giveaways, tickets) for easier tracking.

options.label: Install
